-- error_code_out: -- 0: succeeded -- 547: invalid Account ID -- 2601: duplicated nickname -- *: DB error CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.create_glider_info @character_id dbo.id_t, @account_id dbo.id_t, @id dbo.id_t, @glider_code dbo.code_t, @durability INT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
INSERT INTO Glider_infos(account_id, character_id, id, glider_code, durability) VALUES (@account_id, @character_id, @id, @glider_code, @durability)
SET NOCOUNT OFF
